name: Candy Smash Pinball HD Free - The Puzzle Breaker Mania for iPhone & iPad
name_original: Candy Smash Pinball HD Free - The Puzzle Breaker Mania for iPhone & iPad
description:
### This pinball is totally different ###
### Great puzzles and fantastic gameplay ###
### Easy controls & real physics ###

This pinball game is puzzle action game, where you try to solve all levels with ball and paddles. Fun and challenging levels waiting for you, try it now. This game is totally insane and fun to play, don't miss this.

[ FEATURES ]

+ fantastic levels
+ great gameplay
+ simple and beautiful graphics
+ real physics
+ easy controls
+ great for all pinball lovers
+ new game style
+ fun for hours

We are almost sure you love this game!

[ MORE GAMES ]

We have also made other awesome games, so type "Codecube Brothers" to itunes search field and you can find our other games, which are already available in the AppStore!

[ FEEDBACK ]

We can't answer messages that are written on reviews, so please send your feedback, wishes and bug reports to us support [at] ccbrothers [dot] com.

Thanks for your support :)
